state: Welcome to another life changing session of TextWorld! First step, head south. Following that, head east. Once you succeed at that, take a trip east. And then, make an effort to venture east. That done, make an attempt to go to the south. After that, move east. Following that, make an attempt to take a trip north. With that over with, make an effort to go to the north. Following that, try to go to the north. Then, head west. That done, venture west. Once you accomplish that, try to head south. With that accomplished, take a trip east. Once you get through with that, recover the passkey from the board in the shower. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Austere Workshop =- Ah, the workshop. This is some kind of workshop, really great austere vibes in this place, a wonderful austere atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Austere Workshop =-0/1
next_state: -= Studio =- You find yourself in a studio. A normal one. There is an open door leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Studio =-0/2

next_state: -= Canteen =- You arrive in a canteen. A typical kind of place. There is an open gateway leading south. There is an open door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? next_state: -= Shower =- You are in a shower. A standard kind of place. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a drawer. You can make out a basket. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? Oh, great. Here's a shelf. However, the shelf, like an empty shelf, has nothing on it. You move on, clearly done caring about your TextWorld experience. You see a board. You see a passkey on the board. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bench. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Shower =-0/6

next_state: You take the passkey from the board. Your score has just gone up by one point. *** The End *** You scored 1 out of a possible 1, in 7 turns. Would you like to RESTART, RESTORE a saved game, QUIT or UNDO the last command? > -= Shower =-0/6
